languages.text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Когда существо совершает атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, цель теряет 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очка передвижения{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a melee attack, they lose −2 movement points on their next turn. Stacks.
When this creature attacks enemies with a melee attack, the target loses −2 movement points on their next turn. Stacks.

When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

languages.text: 当此生物使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}手段攻击敌人时，目标下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}失去2点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战{/g}手段{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}敌人时，目标下个回合会失去2点移动点数。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cuando esta criatura ataca a enemigos con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el objetivo pierde −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} en su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuando esta criatura {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}ataca{/g} a enemigos con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el objetivo pierde −2 puntos de movimiento en su siguiente turno. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: この生物が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を攻撃した時、ターゲットは次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}が−2される。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: この生物が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近接攻撃{/g}で敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}した時、ターゲットは次のターンの移動ポイントが-2される。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: Когда существо совершает атаку в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, цель теряет 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}очка передвижения{/g} в свой следующий {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда существо совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}атаку{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}ближнем бою{/g}, цель теряет 2 очка передвижения в свой следующий ход. Эффект суммируется.
Когда существо совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}атаку{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}ближнем бою{/g}, цель теряет 2 очка передвижения в свой следующий ход. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: Greift diese Kreatur Gegner mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} an, verliert das Ziel in seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g}. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn diese Kreatur Gegner mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}Nahkampfangriff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}angreift{/g}, verliert das Ziel in seinem nächsten Zug -2 Bewegungspunkte. Wird aufaddiert.

languages.text: Lorsque cette créature attaque des ennemis en lançant une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, la cible perd −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} lors de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette créature {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaque{/g} des ennemis en lançant une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}attaque de mêlée{/g}, la cible perd -2 points de déplacement lors de son tour suivant. Cumulable.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} ile saldırdığında hedef bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunda{/g} 2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanını{/g} kaybeder. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: When this creature attacks enemies with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, the target loses −2 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} on their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Stacks.
